game.name: Hookah Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Start with a small cozy hookah lounge and turn it into the most popular spot in the city! Your goal is to craft perfect hookahs, satisfying even the most demanding customers.
